questions.question: Where do API keys live in the BlackRoad tokenless architecture?
questions.explanation: The gateway owns all provider secrets. Agents communicate with http://127.0.0.1:8787 and never see keys.

questions.question: What is the default gateway port?
questions.explanation: BLACKROAD_GATEWAY_PORT defaults to 8787. Ollama listens on 11434.

questions.question: Which command verifies no tokens are embedded in agent code?
questions.explanation: verify-tokenless.sh scans for forbidden patterns like sk-proj-, sk-ant-, ANTHROPIC_API_KEY.

questions.question: What is PS-SHA∞?
options: B) A hash-chain journal for tamper-evident memory
questions.explanation: PS-SHA∞ uses SHA256(prev_hash:key:content:timestamp_ns) to create tamper-evident append-only journals.
